greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of digits of 11^n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
program: (PARI) SumD(x)= { local(s=0); while (x>9, s+=x%10; x\=10); return(s + x) } { f=1; for (n=0, 1000, a=SumD(f); f*=11; write("b066005.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [_Harry J. Smith_, Nov 06 2009]
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 2001
